\begin{tikzcd}
&& {\mathscr C\cap \mathscr F} \\
& {\pi (\mathscr C\cap \mathscr F)} && {(\mathscr C\cap \mathscr F) [\mathsf{Weq}^{-1}]} \\
{\,} && {\frac{\mathscr C\cap \mathscr F}{\mathscr C\cap \mathscr W \cap \mathscr F}} && {\,}
\arrow["\pi"', from=1-3, to=2-2]
\arrow["{\text{Localised}}", from=1-3, to=2-4]
\arrow["{\text{Stablised}}"{description}, from=1-3, to=3-3]
\arrow["\cong", tail reversed, from=2-4, to=3-3]
\arrow["{???}", dashed, from=3-3, to=2-2]
\end{tikzcd}
